docs.snippet: The latest on developments in financial markets (all times local):

headline.print_headline: Markets Right Now: Tech Slide Leads Stocks Sharply Lower
headline.main: Markets Right Now: Tech Slide Leads Stocks Sharply Lower

docs.snippet: The main U.S. stock indices advanced more than 2 percent on Monday, helping recoup some of last week's losses, amid signs that the United States and China were willing to negotiate on tariffs eased concerns about a trade war between the two countr...

headline.print_headline: Wall Street Rebounds on Hopes for U.S.-China Talks on Trade
headline.main: Wall Street Rebounds on Hopes for U.S.-China Talks on Trade

docs.snippet: After enduring the struggle to buy a home, a multicultural crowd of friends gathers for a Hindu celebration.

Israel announced Wednesday it was launching a domestic digital health database that could make it a global medical powerhouse. The move aims to improve public health worldwide but critics warn it risks compromising personal privacy.

headline.print_headline: Israel Hopes New Database Will Make It Medical Powerhouse
headline.main: Israel Hopes New Database Will Make It Medical Powerhouse

docs.snippet: A Kenyan high court judge found the Interior Minister and the police chief guilty of contempt on Wednesday and told them to appear for sentencing because they failed to obey a court order to release a detained opposition politician.

headline.print_headline: Kenyan Minister, Police Chief Found in Contempt; Opposition Politician Deported
headline.main: Kenyan Minister, Police Chief Found in Contempt; Opposition Politician Deported

docs.snippet: Money spent on online advertising has risen rapidly, a leading forecaster said, despite talk about firms trimming digital ad budgets as they question the medium's effectiveness.

headline.print_headline: Advertisers Look to Online Ads for Brand Growth: Zenith
headline.main: Advertisers Look to Online Ads for Brand Growth: Zenith

docs.snippet: It is rare for an elected official in Japan to give birth, and voters often question her ability to juggle work and parenting.

headline.print_headline: In Japan, mothers in public office draw criticism
headline.main: In Japan, Voters Are Wary of Mothers in Public Office

docs.snippet: Cambodia's leader on Tuesday rejected the idea of reconciliation talks with the country's only significant opposition party, which was dissolved by court order last November.

headline.print_headline: Cambodia's Leader Says No Negotiations With Opposition
headline.main: Cambodia's Leader Says No Negotiations With Opposition

docs.snippet: A social media furor over data privacy on Indian political party apps escalated on Monday with the ruling Bharatiya Janata Party and opposition Indian National Congress trading barbs.

headline.print_headline: India's BJP, Congress Trade Barbs Over Data Privacy
headline.main: India's BJP, Congress Trade Barbs Over Data Privacy

docs.snippet: Shares of the file-sharing company jumped 36 percent on their first day of trading Friday. The debut is a promising sign for other start-ups.

headline.main: Dropbox Shares Leap in I.P.O., and Silicon Valley Smiles
